Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: I am addicted to this place and I wish they open every day. The herrings here are always fresh and tender - the quality is simply better than anywhere else in Amsterdam. Their smoked salmon is delicious too.

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: Absolutely delicious kibbeling. A must do at least once a week for lunch or passing by. The owner Nico is super nice and friendly. Plenty of space to queue or eat, tables and benches all around and a very nice view of the Ship Museum. What not to like!

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: My first and definitely not last Dutch haring, fresh and very tasty. Big choice of fish dishes, very nice owner. Reasonable prices, one of the best in Amsterdam

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: I was in Amsterdam several times. Every time I see a tent with herring, I go to her place to buy my favorite sandwich with cucumbers and onions. This is the place we visited on our last visit a week ago. It turned out that here it is very ‚Ä¶

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: Very delicious herring! Tasty and seemed slightly cheaper than in other locations in city centre. Also a good choice of other seafood. I will definitely return when I visit Amsterdam again.

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: I have no idea why but the haring here is just infinitely better than in other shops in Amsterdam. It's super buttery and smooth tasting. I'm always disappointed when other places aren't as good.

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: Fantastic herring and fresh onions. The best I‚Äôve had in Amsterdam so far!

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: Delicious haring, awesome service. Fish was very fresh.

Name: Kras Haring
Review Text: The best herring of Amsterdam!

Review Text:

Name: Kras Haring
